member.name: T:rlcx.suid.Ascii85
member.summary: Converts between binary data and an Ascii85-encoded string. Source : https://github.com/LogosBible/Logos.Utility/blob/master/src/Logos.Utility/Ascii85.cs

member.name: M:rlcx.suid.Ascii85.Encode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes the specified byte array in Ascii85.
member.returns: An Ascii85-encoded string representing the input byte array.

member.name: M:rlcx.suid.Suid.NewTinySuid
member.summary: Generate a 8 copy pastable characters Suid (base256)

member.name: M:rlcx.suid.Suid.ToTinySuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Convert a Guid into it's truly unique TinySuid representation

member.name: M:rlcx.suid.Suid.ToSuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Convert a Guid into it's truly unique Suid representation
